task.question: When did Pharaoh usually go out to the Nile waters (Ex. 7:15)?
All of the following happened when Aaron struck the Nile river with the rod EXCEPT (Ex. 7:18)

choices.choice: The Egyptians could not drink it

task.question: What happened just before Pharaoh's heart was hardened after seeing the blood in the Nile (Ex. 7:22)?

choices.choice: He prayed to the god of the Nile
He heard his people crying out for water
His magicians did the same things

task.answer: His magicians did the same things

task.question: How did the Egyptians get drinking water when the Nile was turned to blood (Ex. 7:24)?

choices.choice: They ran the water through straw
They had no water at all
They dug outside the river for water
They sent to Canaan to get water

task.answer: They dug outside the river for water

task.question: How many days after the Nile was turned to blood did the Lord strike Egypt with frogs (Ex. 8:1)?
Moses warned, frogs would come into what part of Pharaoh's house
Who stretched out his hands to bring the frogs on Egypt (Ex. 8:6)?
Pharaoh asked Moses to take the frogs away and Moses allowed Pharaoh (Ex. 8:9)

choices.choice: To set the time when the frogs would leave
To set the places where the frogs would leave
To set the place where the frogs would go
To gather the frogs into the Nile

task.answer: To set the time when the frogs would leave

task.question: After the frogs died, what did the Egyptians do with them (Ex. 8:14)?

choices.choice: They threw them into the Nile

task.question: Pharaoh said that if Moses removed the frogs he would do what (Ex. 8:8)?

choices.choice: Let the Israelites go offer sacrifices to the LORD

task.answer: Let the Israelites go offer sacrifices to the LORD
